Name: Microsoft Teams - Post a message
Description: Posts a message to Microsoft Teams using a general webhook.

Parameters.Name: HookUrl
Parameters.Label: Webhook Url
Parameters.HelpText: The specific URL provided by Microsoft Teams when adding an _Incoming WebHook_ connector to a team channel. Copy and paste the full Webhook URL from Microsoft Teams here.

Parameters.Name: Title
Parameters.Label: Message title
Parameters.HelpText: The title of the message that will be posted to your Microsoft Teams channel.

Parameters.Name: Body
Parameters.Label: Message body
Parameters.HelpText: The message body of post being added to your Microsoft Teams channel.
Parameters.DefaultValue: For more information, please see [deployment details](#{if Octopus.Web.ServerUri}#{Octopus.Web.ServerUri}#{else}#{Octopus.Web.BaseUrl}#{/if}#{Octopus.Web.DeploymentLink})!

Parameters.Name: Color
Parameters.Label: Color
Parameters.HelpText: The color to use for the border on the side of the message.

Parameters.Name: Timeout
Parameters.Label: Timeout in seconds
Parameters.HelpText: The maximum timeout in seconds for each request.

Parameters.Name: TeamsPostMessage.RetryPosting
Parameters.Label: Retry posting message
Parameters.HelpText: Should retries be made? If this option is enabled, the step will attempt to retry the posting of message to teams up to the set retry count. Default: `False`.

Parameters.Name: TeamsPostMessage.RetryCount
Parameters.Label: Retry Count
Parameters.HelpText: The maximum number of times to retry the post before allowing failure. Default 1

Parameters.Name: TeamsPostMessage.RetryDelay
Parameters.Label: Retry delay in milliseconds
Parameters.HelpText: The amount of time in milliseconds to wait between retries. Default 100
